response.overview: Most of us hate having to get our paint-brushes out; we'd much rather be out on the town having fun with our friends (both old and new). But for this group of kinky Brit boys it's all very much a means to an end. White-washing walls soon gets transformed into white-washing throats and asses, as the likes of Skylar Blu, Ethan White and Kyle Dickson kick off their overalls and savor whatever big, uncut dicks come their way ? usually, quite literally! Sex On The Job really does seem to be every inch of hard fun as it sounds.
response.title: On The Job
